parameterdescription.para: A vertical slider is created ifTRUE, otherwise the slider is horizontal.
The maximum value for the slider
The minimum value for the slider

detaileddescription.para: Set the range of the slider.
Sets the amount of change at each step.
Sets the amount of change a small step.

parameterdescription.para: The amount for a small step (for the slider)

detaileddescription.para: Sets the amount of change a large step.

parameterdescription.para: The amount for a large step (for the slider)

detaileddescription.para: Advance the slider forward or backward.

parameterdescription.para: The number of amounts to change, positive to change forward, negative to change backward

simplesect.para: The value of the slider after the change

detaileddescription.para: Set the current value for the slider.
Get the current value for the slider.
Update a label with the value of the slider whenever the value changes.
